= Labs RC Register Images =

#type: node
#context: sop
#internal: labs::rc_register_images
#icon: rc_generic
#tags: sidefxlabs,  model

""" Utility node for the RealityCapture tools. """

The RC Register images node registers all the images that should be used for the photogrammetry scan.


TIP:
    See [This video tutorial|https://www.sidefx.com/tutorials/reality-capture-plugin-open-beta/] for more information.

@parameters
    Add Images:
        Pressing this button will open a file browser to select images.
    File:
        The path to an image on disk that should be registered.
